content:
There are two 2-years post-doc positions at the University of Lyon/Saint-Étienne and École Normale Supérieure de Lyon open to all candidates in Math, Computer Science and their interactions. There are no teaching duties and working on formalising mathematics in Lean would be within the scope of the call:

https://milyon.universite-lyon.fr/postdoctoral-positions-2022-2024-130160.kjsp?RH=1571748911317
I have just got informed that the deadline has been extended to Jan 11th, and that very few applications have been received...Everyone interested might try their chance!

The new call for the same 2-yrs postdoctoral positions in Lyon/Saint-Étienne has just been posted:
https://milyon.universite-lyon.fr/postdoctoral-positions-2023-2025-130160.kjsp?RH=EN-MILYON-9659410765
"All applications not completed before January 4th 2023 will not be considered".
